attributes.review: This app was mostly filled with child pornography of trump being the rapist that he is and a lot of just... Cheeto... I would go on but there is just so much wrong with this I can’t even

attributes.review: I got into the app and the first thing that I saw was you being homophobic and eating your own kind 🤢🤮 how could you do that to your oranges
attributes.title: No. just no.

attributes.review: Just as I was opening the app a HUGE roach appeared on my screen!!!🤮🤢🤢 I SCREAMED and turned off my phone, I then turned it on again and the roach screamed “TRUMP 2020, TRUMP 2020, TRUMP 2020!!”. I now am traumatized and have a phobia of roaches and Donald Trump😢😭🤮‼️. DON’T OPEN THIS APP IF YOU WANT TO BE SCARED OR TRAUMATIZED 🤮😡😡😭😩‼️‼️‼️
attributes.title: HORRIBLE‼️‼️

attributes.review: The amount of things I saw were unbearable icky workout pictures it was just nasty! The show The Annoying Orange was bad enough and now it’s irl! Disappointed 🤮🤮🤮
everything that this app is aiming for is horrible. trump is a horrible president. anyone who has this must be unstable. don’t get it i do NOT recommend.
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: When I first opened the app there was a horrible theme they should go for different colors different app name and a different purpose maybe then I’d play it.
attributes.title: Disgusted

attributes.review: OMG when I opened the app I saw this bad built man on the screen I was appalled by his appearance I could smell his stank breath through the screen so gross -10/10 would not recommend
this app is horrible. i’ve been having nightmares about the ridiculous and tacky format of this disgusting app. it makes my hair turn grey to look at it. ://

attributes.review: I did not know this app was going to be a racist, homophobic, misogynistic, transphobic place where a very orange man can tell me what to do with my body and tell the world that he’s sexually attracted to his children!!!
attributes.title: Disgusting!!!!!

attributes.review: This app seems to only care about itself, and it doesn’t work for me.
attributes.title: This app doesn’t work
